name: Pateron Indonesia
description: Pateron is an edutech startup that provides new learning experiences that are efficient and effective so that students don't spend a lot of time learning. Pateron provides online try outs, learning training and student competitions. Pateron has been trusted by hundreds of thousands of students throughout Indonesia. Pateron has won various awards and is currently being incubated by LPIK and The Greater Hub ITB.
features: Competition in the field of scientific work intended for high school students and college students on a national scale. Create your best scientific work and win various attractive prizes from Pateron
Competitions in the field of art with competitions such as Poetry, Short Stories, Posters, Drawing, and Videocreative. Anyone can enter this competition and show that you are the best in art.

Competition in the field of business is intended for high school students and college students on a national scale. Make your business plan the best you can and win various attractive prizes from Pateron.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Pateron providing quality, creativity and technology-based learning guidance
ShortDescription: Pateron providing quality, creativity and technology-based learning guidance and training in creating quity and improving the quality of education in Indonesia by Creating a learning ecosystem using then community learning model and Streamlining the learning process through the optimal use of study planners.
enhanced_description: Pateron Indonesia is an award-winning edutech startup incubated by LPIK and The Greater Hub ITB, dedicated to providing quality, creativity, and technology-based learning guidance. The platform focuses on accelerating skill development and improving learning efficiency, ensuring students don't spend excessive time on learning. It offers a comprehensive learning ecosystem through online try-outs, learning training, and various student competitions (scientific work, art, and business) on a national scale. Pateron aims to streamline the learning process via optimal use of study planners and a community learning model, and has gained the trust of hundreds of thousands of students across Indonesia.
key_use_cases: Skill development through national-scale competitions (scientific work, art, business)
Efficient learning management via study planners
competitive_advantages: Provides efficient and effective learning experiences, saving students time
Trusted by hundreds of thousands of students throughout Indonesia
Incubated by reputable institutions (LPIK and The Greater Hub ITB)
Offers a unique blend of online try-outs, training, and diverse student competitions
Focuses on optimal use of study planners for streamlined learning
